keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The official, Marzuki Darusman, also said the United Nations should create a panel to identify ways of prosecuting North Koreans for heinous crimes.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: A Warning for Kim
headline.main: North Korea Leader Should Be Told He Could Face Trial, U.N. Official Says

snippet: The official, Marzuki Darusman, also said the United Nations should create a panel to identify ways of prosecuting North Koreans for heinous crimes.
abstract: United Nations human rights report calls on organization to issue formal warning to North Korean leader Kim Jong-un that he and subordinates could be prosecuted for wide range of crimes against humanity.
